lead_paragraph: The writing has been on the wall at Aston Villa for months and defeat at home to Bournemouth on Saturday combined with Norwich City avoiding defeat would signal the end of their ever-present membership of the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Trap Door Gaping for Relegation-Bound Villa
headline.main: Trap Door Gaping for Relegation-Bound Villa

snippet: The writing has been on the wall at Aston Villa for months and defeat at home to Bournemouth on Saturday combined with Norwich City avoiding defeat would signal the end of their ever-present membership of the Premier League....
